title: Cee2
author: Cee2
created_time: October 16, 2022, 09:57:14 PMLast edit: October 16, 2022, 10:09:09 PM by Cee2
content: Dear Bitcointalk Community,There is a cool YouTube video I made on the recognition technology from 3DPass.The next step for me in blockchain plagiarism detection directly on chain.What was the point of the video?I downloaded a 3D shape (Block 65474) in obj format from the official 3DPass blockchain I then tested making small and big adaptions to this 3D file to see whether the recognition algorithm would be able to tell. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5TlDE69Tmmsif you find this cool come and check out the official ANN thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5382009.msg61061837#msg61061837More importantly I encourage you to download the mobile app and just test it out and play with the recognition accuracy, what do you have to lose it's all free?
